_aLatestUpdates._sText:
- reverted the faulting map-workaround for the "round_event" as servers now have fixed their plugins blocking it

- enabled forced in-map human+zombie playermodels, servermanagers can turn this off by running this once: ent_fire manager runscriptcode "::CHEAP_PLAYERMODELS=false;"

- certain props with 'see-through' / $ignorez functionality should now work again (thanks ficool)

- applied a workaround for a somewhat rare issue with mismatching network ID's

- optimized the BEAMGRID event by decreasing trigger size

- heal_orb will now give the proper/vanilla max ammo to each specific weapon class

- added unique targetnames for all hitboxes, making things easier to hook by plugins (boss_eye_hitbox / hitbox_pizzadoom / hitbox_kamikaze / hitbox_thigh_spider)

- altered several things in hopes of making boostpads function more reliably

- converted ladders to a different class in hopes of solving weird jank being able to jump really high

- fixed issue on the RISE ending where the falling tiles weren't indicated with red color/positional dent

- fixed issue with the spawn killer, repeat killer on servers should now function properly

- altered all music sounds by adding "#" at the start of the path (music-slider should now work)

- zacade figured out why env_explosion with killcredit wasn't working, it's ZR blocking the damage - this needs to (has been?) fixed server-side

- the race ending will now automatically fail if there's not enough humans (4) to start

- the impostor item will now hide the radar during its hidden-state (thanks zacade)

- fixed issue where bill nye didn't stop ticking after getting destroyed by a destructo hammer

- fixed issue with a solid brush door in spawn, it's now non-solid and won't move

- fixed issue with incorrect debris OOB triggers, the falling debris will now hit people more accurately

- simplified and moved the "[INVINCIBLE]" text to not cover the middle of the screen

- the dragonslayer is now orange-tinted when buffed by a firecrystal (this was initially broken due to missing prop glow in CS:S)

- reworked the boss 'look at' effects to render more clearly (this was initially broken due to missing prop glow in CS:S)

- converted a handful of "solid"/"collisiongroup" commands to their proper functions, for safety (some were missed in css2)

- added even further logic to prevent issue with players falling through airslide tiles (CS:S triggers really can't be trusted it seems)

- tweaked the karts so you only enter driving-mode by standing on top AND looking down (previously you just had to stand on top)

- reworked the kart-controls entirely, WASD steering, CTRL to get off, SPACE to jump, HOLD SHIFT to use the original mouse-steering (can be toggled via ::TRAPS.kart.new_controls=true)

- added dirty workaround-logic for server plugins blocking the "round_end" event (server-managers still need to look into this!!!)

- fixed crashes related to packed game-sounds

- fixed crash related to env_explosion passing null attacker

- fixed issues with the finale elevators (people should no longer fall through them)

- fixed issue with players falling through airslide tiles

- converted a ton of "solid"/"collisiongroup" commands to their proper functions, for safety

- tweaked the end timing for the kart ending

- fixed sound precache issues which should hopefully solve sporadically silent music/sounds

- fixed the kamikaze plane being sideways

- now preventing flashlights from being used due to visual glitches

- tweaked the bomb_chuck item to explode differently, hopefully fixed dealing damage now

- tweaked the bomb_chuck item to explode the user who presses E on it to push it away (re-enabled logic from CS:GO)

- the map now gives +100 points to players who complete a stage

_sText:
ze_collective


[Join the collective]
1) Visit:   Luffaren.com/ze_collective
2) Draw a 20x20 image via the web-editor
3) Submit the 20x20 image to the web
4) Luffaren reviews all submitted images
5) Accepted images get added to the map

[This map includes]
- YOUR pixel-levels (1000+ and expanding)
- Themes
- Items
- Traps
- Events
- 5 stages (4 difficulties, 1 finale)
- A bossfight with an exciting ending
- Infinite mode (when map is beaten)

Admin room: (visible just above spawn)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To win the map:
- Complete the 4 difficulties + their respective endings.
- Complete the finale + its ending.
- Complete the infinite finale + its ending (the higher the stage/check-out count, the better).

The stage/check-out count will be what separates men from boys. 
Which team will be able to go the furthest?

Good luck!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This CS:S port was made possible thanks to the recent update which implemented Vscript into the game.

Please do not alter or port this map elsewhere, thank you!

Huge thanks to Ficool and Xen for helping out with a bunch of technical issues that came with the CS:S port!
